for_account_security: For account security settings, please visit the
warning_delete: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain
using_services: By using our services, you agree to our use of essential cookies for authentication and security
add_extra_layer_security: Add an extra layer of security to your account
scan_this_qr: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
enter_verification_code: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
cookie_notice: We use essential cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our service
privacy_welcome: Welcome to Frontier's Privacy Policy. This document explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our gaming platform.
privacy_respect: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy_info_types: We may collect the following types of information
privacy_technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
privacy_provide_services: Provide, maintain, and improve our gaming services
privacy_track_results: Process and track game results and statistics
privacy_security_measures: We have implemented appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered, or disclosed.
privacy_limit_access: We limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors, and other third parties who have a business need to know. They will only process your personal data on our instructions, and they are subject to a duty of confidentiality.
privacy_rights_desc: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to:
privacy_request_access: Request access to your personal data
privacy_request_correction: Request correction of your personal data
privacy_request_erasure: Request erasure of your personal data
privacy_object_processing: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy_restrict_processing: Request restriction of processing your personal data
privacy_cookie_essential: We use essential cookies that are necessary for the proper functioning of our website. These cookies enable core functionality such as user authentication, security, and account management.
privacy_cookies_we_set: These are cookies that we set ourselves:
privacy_access_token: Used to maintain your authenticated session
privacy_google_cookies: When you use Google Sign-In functionality, Google may set and read cookies such as:
privacy_g_state: Used by Google to store session state information
privacy_google_auth: Google may use additional cookies to maintain your authentication state and provide security features
privacy_google_more: For more information about cookies used by Google Sign-In, please refer to
privacy_no_tracking: These essential cookies do not collect any personal information that could be used for marketing purposes. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.
privacy_retention_periods: The cookies we use have the following retention periods
privacy_token_expires: This cookie expires after 1 hour or when you log out
privacy_google_varying_times: These cookies have varying expiration times set by Google
privacy_questions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
image_size_limit: The maximum image size is 2 MB
avatar_update_fail: Failed to update avatar. Please try again.
username_update_fail: Failed to update username. Please try again.
no_friends: You don't have any friends yet
remove_friend_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this friend?
remove_friend_fail: Failed to remove friend. Please try again.
an_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error_accept_friend_request: Error accepting friend request. Please try again.
error_reject_friend_request: Error rejecting friend request. Please try again.
no_users_found: No users found matching your search criteria
error_searching_users: Error searching for users. Please try again.
friend_request_fail: Failed to send friend request. Please try again.
